trans-unit.source: Provides extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) serialization services for a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece serviços de serialização XAML (Extensible Application Markup Language) para um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.CompositeActivityMarkupSerializer> performs any serialization required for composite activities to be represented in an XAML file associated with a workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.CompositeActivityMarkupSerializer> executa qualquer serialização necessária para atividades compostas ser representado em um arquivo XAML associado a um designer de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.CompositeActivityMarkupSerializer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.CompositeActivityMarkupSerializer" />.
